short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to convert raw JSON data into something beautiful.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension to convert raw JSON data into something beautiful. 

Just simply:
1. Paste your raw JSON in the box below 
2. Hit the green button to make your JSON look gorgeous + copy the results to your clipboard 
3. Paste the results in your favorite text editor!
